fulltext:
Bruce Viet Dung Le 
Vinhomes Central Park, Park 6A, Binh Thanh District | Ho Chi Minh City | 096 8310592 | vdl.bruce@web.de 
education 
2012-2015        EUROPEAN UNIVERSITY VIADRINA 
    FRANKFURT (ODER), GERMANY  
Degree with Distinction in B.Sc. International Business Administration (top 2% of class). GPA: 1.2 
(German grading scale). Awarded 4 merit-based scholarships including 2 national scholarships. 
fall 2013 
  SINGAPORE MANAGEMENT UNIVERSITY 
SINGAPORE 
International exchange programme with Lee Kong Chian School of Business. 
experience 
spring 2018      DELOITTE DIGITAL 
BERLIN, GERMANY 
- spring 2019    The Garage (Innovation Hub) | Business Consultant  
Led a team of 3 for a pricing initiative for a German beverages company using a neuroscientific approach 
• 
Defined work packages and help set up behavioral experiments including data measurement and analyses 
• 
Responsible for stakeholder alignment and impact evaluation; implemented recommended pricing 
strategy resulting in ~€300k additional revenue per month 
Led a team of 2 as Product Owner to build a Blockchain MVP in Trade Finance for multiple European banks. 
• 
Worked closely with client’s technology leader and help define product requirements using Design Thinking 
• 
Managed developers to deliver MVP; achieved approval of €1.2m additional funding for follow up project 
summer 2016   MONITOR DELOITTE STRATEGY 
BERLIN, GERMANY 
- spring 2018    Strategy & Operations | Management Consultant (promoted from Analyst after 10 months) 
Led a work package of Deloitte Australia for its new strategy to enter the Asia Pacific market. 
• 
Defined playing field and conducted competitor analyses to identify countries to prioritize 
• 
Conducted a scenario analysis to test the strategy against future trends which led to the decision to merge 
Deloitte Australia, New Zealand, China, Japan and Southeast Asia to create a $10bn business by 2022 
Supported a leading German car manufacturer in a major sales strategy project.  
• 
In charge of a multi-brand residual value analysis within the used car sales department 
• 
Created action plan to increase used car sales by 1% (total sales impact: ~€120m) and prepared  
rollout to 5 EU markets (plan was submitted and approved by management board)  
spring 2016       THE BOSTON CONSULTING GROUP 
DÜSSELDORF, GERMANY 
 Management Consulting | Visiting Associate 
 Supported a leading Dutch retail company in optimizing store capex spend, achieved ~10% (€2M) in total savings. 
leadership 
fall 2016           WORLD ECONOMIC FORUM - GLOBAL SHAPERS COMMUNITY 
BERLIN, GERMANY 
- present          Vice Curator  
Organized talks, workshops and various social events to connect influential people and raise awareness about local issues. 
Global Shapers is an initiative of the World Economic Forum, developed & led by people under 30 who are exceptional in 
potential, achievement & drive to make an impact in their community.  
entrepreneurship 
summer 2019    BELAZY 
HO CHI MINH CITY, VIETNAM 
- present           Strategy & Operations | Co-Founder  
Building a managed marketplace for home services where customers can order services like beauty, spa or nailcare 
conveniently through our app to their homes. 
• 
Won $2000 in an ideation hackathon organized by a local Vietnamese VC to build the mobile app 
• 
Soft launched web app (belazy.vn) to test product market fit: 50+ bookings with GMV of 20.000.000 VND  
summer 2017   INFINITY FLOWERBOX 
BERLIN, GERMANY 
- winter 2018    Strategy & Partnerships | Co-Founder  
Co-founded a flower start-up (~€500k revenue) with social impact, 10% of each flowerbox sold is donated to a specific 
purpose depending on  the color: red against AIDS, pink against cancer, white against world hunger, yellow for education 
and blue for clean water. 
• 
Closed a 6-figure deal with Amazon PrimeNOW (1 hour delivery service) to be their exclusive flower supplier  
• 
Raised €100k from private investors to expand sales operations in France, UK, Spain and Italy 
skills & interests 
• 
Languages: German (native), English (fluent), Vietnamese (fluent), Mandarin Chinese (conversational proficiency) 
• 
IT skills: MS Office Suite (with emphasis on Excel and PowerPoint), Latex, SNL, Factiva, Bloomberg Terminal 
• 
Personal: Keen interest in blockchain and distributed ledger technologies, enjoy going to social events, 
Travelling and reading non-fiction books, care deeply about poverty alleviation through education
